channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee LLC -- Endpoint Security (ENS) for Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee LLC -- Endpoint Security (ENS) for Windows

item.title: CVE-2021-23883|2024-09-17T01:41:53.554Z -- mcafee%20llc -- endpoint%20security%20%28ens%29%20for%20windows
item.description: A Null Pointer Dereference vulnerability in McAfee Endpoint Security (ENS) for Windows prior to 10.7.0 February 2021 Update allows a local administrator to cause Windows to crash via a specific system call which is not handled correctly. This varies by machine and had partial protection prior to this update.

item.title: CVE-2021-23881|2024-09-17T01:41:33.007Z -- mcafee%20llc -- endpoint%20security%20%28ens%29%20for%20windows
item.description: A stored cross site scripting vulnerability in ePO extension of McAfee Endpoint Security (ENS) prior to 10.7.0 February 2021 Update allows an ENS ePO administrator to add a script to a policy event which will trigger the script to be run through a browser block page when a local non-administrator user triggers the policy.
